greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of perfect powers, A001597.
comment: Not multiplicative: for example, a(8)=a(9)=1, but a(72)=0. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 09 2005
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Perfect Powers.
mathematica: a[n_] := Boole[GCD @@ FactorInteger[n][[All, 2]] > 1]; a[1] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 105}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 12 2011 *)
program: a075802 n = signum $ a052409 n - 1  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 26 2012
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 13 2002
